overview: Hashim is a young Moroccan who has been arrested by the police. He is part of a group of friends who share life in the neighborhood and also its difficulties. His mother, tired of seeing her son's situation, decides to find him a job in a barbershop. Although Hashim will begin to mature, feeling comfortable in this new stage, a last adventure proposed by his great friend Sebas will force him to decide.
title: Countdown
